General.Name: Saudi Company for Hardware
General.Description: Saudi Company for Hardware SACO is involved in the retailing and wholesaling of household and office supplies and appliances, construction tools and equipment, and electrical tools and hardware in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company operates in two segments, Sales and Services, and Logistic Services. It also offers freight forwarding, transportation, and contract logistics, as well as installation and maintenance services. The company also sells its products online. Saudi Company for Hardware SACO was incorporated in 1984 and is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

1.Name: Mr. Khalid Mohammed Abdulaziz Al-Hamidi
